articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Lions Gate Entertainment (LGFa.N) has suspended advertising on Elon Musk-owned X, a spokesperson for the company said on Friday.
articles.title: Lionsgate suspends advertising on X

articles.author: Lewis Krauskopf
articles.description: Are U.S. stocks poised to continue their dramatic run, or is a pause ahead? That’s the question investors are asking as the S&P 500 heads into the close of the year with a fresh record high coming into view.
articles.title: Wall St Week Ahead After breathtaking surge, U.S. stocks' path may rest on economic soft landing

articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.description: Amazon.com (AMZN.O) on Friday announced it is trimming roles at its Alexa voice assistant unit, citing “shifting” business priorities and a greater focus on generative artificial intelligence.
articles.title: Exclusive: Amazon.com to cut 'several hundred' Alexa jobs

articles.author: Elida Moreno
articles.description: A ship with supplies for Canadian miner First Quantum's unit in Panama was unable to dock as local boats blocked off access to the key port, the company said in a statement to Reuters on Friday.
articles.title: Panama port blockade keeps supplies from First Quantum mine, company says

articles.author: Howard Schneider
articles.description: Millions of "gig" workers may get missed every month in the U.S. government's employment report, a discrepancy with implications for how Federal Reserve officials size up the job market and any associated inflation risks.
articles.title: US jobs data may be miscounting millions of 'gig' workers, research suggests

articles.author: Katie Paul
articles.description: Meta's (META.O) head of augmented reality software is stepping down from his role, a company spokesperson told Reuters on Friday, raising questions about the company's progress in developing a custom operating system for its planned AR glasses.
articles.title: Exclusive: Meta's head of augmented reality software stepping down

articles.author: Saeed Azhar, Svea Herbst-Bayliss, Tatiana Bautzer
articles.description: Citigroup (C.N) employees expect further announcements about management changes and layoffs on Monday in the next phase of the bank’s sweeping reorganization, according to four people familiar with the situation.
articles.title: Citigroup employees expect management reshuffle, layoffs on Monday-sources

articles.author: Jeffrey Dastin, Anna Tong, Samrhitha A, Krystal Hu
articles.description: The board of the company behind ChatGPT late on Friday fired OpenAI CEO Sam Altman - to many, the human face of generative AI - sending shock waves across the tech industry.
articles.title: ChatGPT maker OpenAI ousts CEO Sam Altman

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi, James Mackenzie
articles.description: Israel issued a fresh warning to Palestinians in the southern city of Khan Younis to relocate west out of the line of fire and closer to humanitarian aid in the latest indication that it plans to attack Hamas in southern Gaza after subduing the north.
articles.title: Israel renews call for Gazans to flee key southern city

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Gunfire erupted on Friday at a state psychiatric hospital in New Hampshire, leaving multiple victims and the suspect dead, state police and emergency management officials reported.
articles.title: New Hampshire police report multiple victims shot at state psychiatric hospital
